name: pnp-search-flows-for-connection
title: Search flows for connections
shortDescription: This sample allows you to get a report of all flows that are connected to a specific site or list.
longDescription: Search all flows as, an administrator, for a specific search string and report results. This sample allows you to get a report of all flows that are connected to a specific site or list. The `$searchString` can be any value but results are the best when using a GUID or site collection URL.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
